import React, { useState } from 'react' import Map from './Map' const Main = () => { const [range, setRange] = useState(0); const shipPositions = [ {positionX: 51.505, positionY: -0.09}, {positionX: 52.505, positionY: -0.09}, {positionX: 51.700, positionY: -0.09}, {positionX: 50.505, positionY: -0.09}, ] const handleRange = (e) => { setRange(e.target.value) } const handleReset = () => { setRange(0) } return(
Kliknij na statek aby poznać szczegóły dotyczące uzbrojenia
) } export default Main;
